name: grpplusfo
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))

comment: The group addition operation is a function onto the base set/set of group elements. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-2006.) (Revised by AV, 30-Aug-2021.)
